title: Author Colleen Hoover Shares Her Cancer Journey
summary: Colleen Hoover, a famous author who writes books like It Ends With Us, has told everyone she had cancer. She is 46 years old and from the United States. She shared this news on Instagram and Facebook. Colleen had surgery to remove the cancer, and it was successful. She also had radiotherapy treatment, which is almost done. She kept her cancer private at first because she wanted to wait until she knew she was okay. Colleen missed some important events, like a movie premiere, because she was sick. She thinks her cancer might be related to not exercising enough, eating unhealthy food, and feeling stressed. Even though she hates vegetables and exercise, she is happy to be alive. Her new book, Woman Down, just came out this week.

background_read: Colleen Hoover is a popular author known for writing emotional stories that many people love. She has written best-selling books like It Ends With Us, which is being made into a movie. Authors often share personal news with fans to connect with them. Cancer is a disease that affects many people, and treatments like surgery and radiotherapy help fight it. Social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook allow celebrities to talk directly to their followers about important life events.
Article_Structure: WHO: Colleen Hoover, a 46-year-old US author known for books like It Ends With Us.
WHAT: She revealed she had cancer, had successful surgery and radiotherapy, and shared this on social media.
WHERE: She shared the news on Instagram and Facebook, and received treatment at Texas Oncology in the US.
WHY: She wanted to update fans after keeping it private until she knew the outcome and to thank her doctors.

perspectives.description: Colleen's experience shows how people deal with serious illnesses and share their stories to inspire others.
